description: Route data based on field values and complex conditional logic with support for various operators and data types.

input_data.info: Data object to be evaluated and routed based on field conditions.

routing_rules.info: JSON array of routing rules. Each rule contains conditions with field paths, operators, and values.

evaluation_strategy.info: Strategy for selecting routes when multiple rules match: first_match, all_matches, priority_based, or score_based.

default_route.info: Name of the route to use when no rules match (ignored when fail_on_no_match is enabled).

strict_typing.info: Whether to enforce type conversion when comparing values.

null_safe_comparison.info: Whether to handle null/None values safely in comparisons.

max_routes.info: Maximum number of routes to return for strategies that support multiple matches (0 for unlimited).

include_route_metadata.info: Whether to include detailed routing metadata in the output.

fail_on_no_match.info: Whether to throw an error when no rules match instead of using the default route.

warnings.using_default_route: No rules matched, using default route: {route}

errors.invalid_input_data: Input must be a Data object.
errors.no_matches_fail_mode: No rules matched and fail_on_no_match is enabled.
